div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem secundo die
mensis Junij Anno quo supra

The said' day Alexander Ridaile was conuict' be ane suorne assis' James Colisone
forspekar for trubulance of Johne arthour' in deid' and for tribulance of the
toune for the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament' of the Court' and to amend' as law
wile and forber' in tyme to Cum And' the said' Johne arthour' quyt of
ale trubulance of the said' Alexander Ande atour It was deliuerit be the aldirman
Counsale and assis' for the amendis of the said' trubulance that the saide Alexander
sale stand' in the goif and his knif in his hande furtht at the hoile at the wile
of the aldirman and balyeis et cetera and Cum to morne In tyme of the hie mes' with
ane wax candil in his hande contening and pvnde and Sitt done on his
kne and ask the said' Johne forgiwnes and offir' the said' Candile to the haly
blud' licht

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta iin pretorio eiusdem quarto die
mensis Junij Anno quo supra

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Johnne of mar forspekar
that Dauid steuart sale pay his part of the money contenit in obligacione
to Robert coleson burges of Dunde and gif it ples' him to haue the haf
of the money that malcome of crag has ressauit for the penny worthis or ellis
the half of the penny worthis quhilkis he resauit fra the merchand of Dunde
and for his pennyworthtis

The said' day Johnne' arthour grant him payt of xxvij s' aucht to him be
sande riddall in malt

The said day the court wardit schew for law and' it was gevin for dome
that Dauid theman hed falyeit in his preff of ane pece of gold'
and pertening to him fundin be criste fynne

Th said day the court wardit schew for law and' it was gevin for
dome that baidenagh' the relict' of vmquhill Wiliam goldsmitht
hed' preuit sufficiently was notably knawin that the said pece
of gold' fundin be criste fynne was the said William goldsmythtis

The saide day thomas leslie complenyeit that William Wormet hed' trubulit him
and the said' William Wormet complenyeit that the said' thomas hede trubulit him
quhilkis trubulance thai denyit one athir' part And in Continent thareftir the saide
actioun' was put to the decisioun' of ane assis' with consent of batht the
saide partiis of thir personis that is to say Dauid menyeis gilbert menyeis Dauid
andirsone thomas chamer Alexander gray Dauid Andirsone mar' Androw fif Johne moir'
patry Rede henry red' Johne Ratre Dauid steuart mathou branche Androw lousone
Robert Waus Johne ramsay and William rolland' quhilkis riplie auisit the gret
aithe suorne the richtis resonis allegaciounis and preuis of batht the saide partiis
herde seyne and vndirstandin deliuerit and fand' that thai coud' nocht acquit the
said' William of trubulance of the saide thomas leslie in worde for the quhilkis he was
in ane amerciament of the Court et cetera to amende as law wile and forber' in tym' to cum Ande
the said' thomas leslie thai coud nocht acquit for trubulance of the saide Williame
in worde for the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament of the court and to amende as law
wile et cetera and forber' in tyme to Cum

The said' day It was fundin and deliuerit be the said' assis' that Niniane blinsele
doys wrang in haldin of the maile of the witsonday terme last bigan of the hous' that
he occupeis fra Elizibetht leslie for the relict of Dauid blinsele for ony thing'
that thai hede seyne as yet Samekle' as scho cane preiwe the said' hous Set
forth

The said day megy coupar was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' Duncan fif forspekar
for trubulance of Anny Coupar the Relict of WIlliame Coupar et cetera / And' the said' Anny
was conuict' for trubulance of the saide megy' et cetera for the quhilk Ilkan of tham
was in ane amerciament of the Court et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vijo
die Junij anno quo supra

The said' day the prouest and balyeis assignit monunday the xiiij
day of the monetht of June Instant to Robert guthtre of
Si glensauchan and to Androw fif his procurator and forspekar one
that ane part Ande to Dauid colp one that vthir part to bringe
thar' previs witnes richtis and documentis quhilkis thai haue
and wile wis' to preiwe the age of Isabele buchane douchtir ande
ayr tile vmquhile Williame of buchan gif scho excedis the
yeris of tutory ande Is vteuthe tutory or nocht eftir the tenor
of our Souerane lordis lettres of batht partiis direct' to thame
tharapon' as in the Samyn is contenit

The said' day the aldirman balyeis and counsale licenceit and'
levit thome chamer ane of thar' clerkis to pas' to the Study
and sculis Ande resauit Jok of murray his substitut to serue
in the feriale dais vndir him and the said' thomas sale keipe
ale Soundais and haly dais his avne seruice Ande he sale nocht
conduce hir' nor fee him with nay' persone nor personis quhile the
toun' refus' his seruice Ande he promittit to his said' subsitut
Jok murray the half of the profit of the said' Clerkschip for
the tyme that seruis' It

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiiijo
die mensis Junij anno quo supra

The said' day the aldirman balyeis denys of gilde and diuers' of the Counsale
present for the tyme at the Request of mastir Alexander Setone Remittit Duncan Waldy and
forgaf ale vnlawis and amerciamentis that he Is fallin In and conuict of or
may be accusit to this day And' the saide mastir Alexander oblist him neuir
to mak request for him in tyme to Cum

The said' day the prouest and ballieis ordanit and direct' Williame scrimgeor
officiar' to pas' with elizibetht leslie or hir' procuratouris to punde Compele
and distrenye for hir' malys and annuele rentis aving to hir' of the landis
quhilkis scho has in coniunctfeftment of vmauhile Dauid blinsele hir'
Spous' liand' in the burghe' of Abirdene

The said' day the prouest and balyeis with avis' of the Counsale present for the
tyme assignit monunday the xxj day of the monetht of June Instant tile
Androw fif procurator tile Robert guthtrie of glensauchantis one that ane part
Ande to Dauid Colp one that vthir part to bring thar preuis witnes richtis
and documentis quhilkis thai haue and wile vys' to preiwe the age of Isabele
buchane douchtir and ayr tile vmquhile Williame of buchane douchtir burges
of the said' burghe gif scho excedis the yeris of tutory and Is vteuthe tutory
or nocht as day of peremptour eftir the tenor of our Souerane lordis lettres di
rectit to thame tharapone be batht the said' partiis that thai mycht procede and
minister Justice equalie In the said' actioun to batht the forsaid' partiis

The said' day Robert Waus oblist him be his hande vphaldin to
pay to androw Cullane Aldirman j barrele of girls' for huchon' wellis
sufficient gude within xv dais and the saide huchone oblist him be the fatht
of his bodie to releiwe the saide Robert

The said' day Walter Cullane was fundin quyt be ane Suorne assis'
Johne ratre forspekar of the wranguis' takin of ane Salmond'
clamit be Robert Waus et cetera And' the said' Robert was conuict for trubulance
of the said' Walter and the said' Walter for trubulance of the said' Robert in
word' et cetera for the quhilkis Ilkan of thame was in amerciament of the court et cetera

The said' day thomas Inglisman was conuict be his avne
toung graunt for trubulance of Androw Cullane prouest of the
said' burghe' in word' for the quhilk he was in americament of the
Court and tile amend' as law wile et cetera and to forber' in tyme to cum
And' the aldirman continevit the amendis quhile this viij dais

The said' day george bysset come Souerte to the balyeis that
Cristiane meldrum the relict of Johne balcromy and hir' gudis
sale Remane within the hous' quhar' scho is now quhile the
fest of michaelmes nixt to cum sua that the ayris of the
saide Johne may purches and rais' breuis of Inquest of our'
Souerane lordis chapele within the said' tyme for the airschip
that thai may clame of him And' at the said' fest of micha
elmes' the said' george Is fred' of borrougange'

Curia Balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo
primo die mensis Junij Anno quo supra et cetera

The said day Isabell marioun cullane the relict' of vmquhill Alexander houy
sone grantit that sche set the forbutht quhilkis Dauid brois' duellis in
to Agnes strathachin the spous of Androw gordone for this Instant yeir

The said day george doloche' grantit him awand' ane frenche crone
of gold' to the wif of thomas Watsone quhilkis the bailyes chargit
him to pay withtin tuenty dais

The said day the bailyes assignit friday that nixt cummis to Johne'
ratre to preif that Williame Walkar tuk his hous' fra this yheir

The said day bessy sibbald' deponit be hir aitht that sche was godmodir
to Isabell buchane and' Androue branche' godffadyr and' hewf hir one monunday
befor festerinevine and' sche dynit that day in Alexander chameris hous' sche trowis
sche is xj yeris ald' or ellis gangand in the tuelft yeir and' Androw branch'
and' Alexander chamer was baitht haill and feir that tyme
Jonet Kintor spous to Alexander tailyour deponit be hir aitht that Isabell
buchane douchtir and' ayr till vmquhill William buchane burges of Abirdene
is alevin yeiris ald and mair
Isabell of cullan the relict' of Alexander chamer deponit be hir aitht sche hwyff
Isabell buchane one monunday befor festerinevine in the said Alexanderis chamer hir
husbandis tyme sche was ane yeir or he deyt that sche huyf neuire barne
sche trowis sche pass' alevin yer' ald'
Alexander prat deponis he knavis nocht hir age
Cristiane mortimer deponit be hir aitht that Isabell buchan is xij yeris ald'

Margaret buchane sais Isabell buchane is tuelf yeris ald'
sche is witht barne and' micht nocht sueir bot sche tuk it one
hir saule /
Cristiane lilburne deponit be hir aitht that Isabell buchan'
is alevin yeir auld' at festerinevin that last was
Johnne cullan depnit be his aitht he trastis the writ producit
vndir the aldirmanis seill is trewe /
Johnne moir deponit be his aitht that he was bundin witht
Androwe cullane in ane obligacioun' to Williame buchane for
his mariage gudis ane yeir befor yone obligacioun' bundin be
the prior of monymusk /
Dauid brois' kennys nay thing of hir age
Johnne cuk kennis nay thing of hir age
Margret Kintor kennys nay thing of hir age /
Elizibetht movat medwif deponit be hir aitht sche cane
nocht tell the eld' of Isabell buchane bot be hir wittin sche
wantit part of fiue yeris befor the ded' fra sanct Katherinis'
day to festerinevin
The wif of Androw cullane deponit be hir aitht sche wait
nocht quhat age Isabell buchan Is bot sche coud' gange ett
and' drink lang befor the ded' et cetera

The said day It was sufficiently preuyt that Isabell buchane douchtir
and ayr till vmquhill Williame buchane burges of the said burgh' is
alevin yeiris ald' a borne of hir modir at festerinevin last bigane

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxv
die mensis Junij anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo septimo

The said' day Johne mar follouit and persevit the aldirman in the townis nayme for
his costis and expensis maid' in Einburghe at the chakir throw the wanting of the
maile of ane half nethis fischingis of the mydchingill quhilkis Dauid colp
fischit and hed' the proffit of tile his vys' quhilkis Costis expensis the aldirman
denyit in the townis nayme Ande thareftir the saide actioun' was put to the decision'
of ane assis' of thir personis eftir writin that is to say Dauid menyeis Johne cullan
gilbert menyeis alexander gray James Colison patry leslie patry rede Richerde
Waus Androw fyf Androw stratoun' thomas leitht patry leslie youngar Dauid fynne
Androw barkar Robert Waus malcome Crag and Alexander Retht burgis of the said' burghe
quhilkis riplie auisit the gret aithe suorne the richtis resounis and allegacionis of batht
the said' partiis herd' seyne and vndirstandin deliuerit and furthtgaf that the aldirman
and balyeis balyeis in the townis nayme sale pay to Johne mar' fyve markis for
his costis and expensis maid' be him at the chakir throw want of the maile of the
said' half nethis fischingis occupeit be the said' Dauid Colp quhilkis he suld'
haue pait becaus' he fischit the said' wattir'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta infra dictum burgum xxviij die mensis Junij
anno quo supra

The said' day Dauid Steuart grauntit him aving to gilbert menyes
ane barrele of girls' and xxv s' vsuale money of Scotland quhilkis
the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quinto
die mensis Julij anno quo supra

The said day the prouest and bailyeis assignit this day xv dais xix day Julij to William
Wormet to ansueir to the borgh' fundin one him be Isabell crichtone for the
wranguis' stoppin of the Some of xxv pund grettis vij s' g' and'
four g' beand' in the handis of Jacob the graive and' awe to recompens'
hir the skaitht in the wantyn of the said Some togiddir with the princi
pall Some /

The said day the prouest and bailyes with auis' of the consaill commandit and chargit
ale the flessouris of this burgh' to haue sufficient stuf beif and muttoun' to
furnis' the toune and' that nay beif be sauld' quhill It be prisit and' that
nay mutone be sauld' bot the be the sicht of prisaris and' nane derrar
na xxxij d' the bouk vndir the pane of brekin of commone ordinance and' ane
vnlaw vneforgevin

The said day the prouest and' bailyes chargit meche schanstir to deliuer
to James Wricht ane hewing et cetera withtin terme of lawe

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem ix die
mensis Julij anno quo supra

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicionem Curie quod Dauid mernys
est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam Walteri mernys patris suj

The said' day the prouest and balyeis assignit monunday that next
Cumys to Dauid steuart tile ansuer' to the burghe' fundin one him be John'
murray that he aw to deliuere to him tua franche Crovnis and xliiijor eduarde
grotis with half ane Inglis grot' pakit in ane clout with Dauid arrotis
siluere et cetera and wrangis that he doys it nocht et cetera as in the said borghe mar' fullely
Is contenit

The said' day thomas chamer and Dauid Stevart grauntit to pay to gilbert menyeis
the Rest of the wyne tane be thame ande thar seruandis y Sene thar'
entreys' in the office of Abbat and Prior of Concord' of this burghe
this day or to morne

The said' day patry Walcar' was conuict be ane Suorne assis' Dauid mar'
forspekar for the trubulance of Ellene bysset spous' to Robert fraser cordonar
for the quhilkis he was in ane Amerciament of the court et cetera Atour the balyeis chargit
him to remane within the tolbutht quhile he fand' law borrowis that the said' ellen'
suld' be skathtles of him ale ways bot as the court law wile

The saide day the belmane passit throu the haile toune and warnit ale
and Sindrie personis havande takis or wattiris fischingis and landis of thame
at commavnd' of the prouest balyeis and counsale for the outred' of the
led' bocht to Sanct nicholes werk and completing of the samyn'
to Comper the said' day within the tolbutht to pay thar' malys
and girssomes Ande thareftir it was statut and ordanit be the aldirman balyeis
and diuers' of the Counsale and' communite present for the tyme that ale personis
havand' takis of fischingis wattiris and landis of this burghe' sale pay
thar girssomes' and malys aving to Sanct nicholes werk and the towne
within viij dais hereftir follouing Ande falyeing tharof It salbe lesum
to the prouest balyeis Counsale and Communite to sett and dispone thar
takkis of wattiris fischingis and landis tile vthiris that wile pay
mailes and girssome ansuering tharto vpon' the quhilkis Androw cullan
prouest askit Instrument of me sere Johne Stirueling notar public'
witnes Dauid menyeis gilbert menyes Dauid andirsone Alexander mar'
Androw fyf Duncan fyf Alexander menyes sere Dauid leis sere Robert patonson'
mastir gavane leslie sere Dauid Waus William blakhall of that Ilk and vthir
diuers'

head.add: Wormet ayris of Robert cullan Crichton'

div.p:
The said' day Williame Wormet grauntit to deliuer tile Androw Cullan
prouest ane Jak ane par' of Corslatis In the nayme of the ayris of
vmquhile Robert Cullane quhilkis he hed' in his possessioun' Ande
Isabele crichtoune grauntit to deliuer to the said' Androw Cullane ane
Siluer spvne quhilkis scho hed' pertening to the saide ayris

The said' day Dauid Colp allegit the prouest and balyeis parciale ande
suspect to him in the actioun' and caus' concerning to him tharfor he declynit
the prouest balyeis and vthiris officiaris of the said' burghe in ale actionis perte
ning to him and declarit thame suspect to him in tyme to Cum

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xijo die mensis
Julij anno quo supra

The said' day the prouest and ballieis assignit friday that next Cumis
tile Dauid Colp tile ansuer to the Complaint in strintht of ane borghe'
directit on' him for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of xxvj s' of annuell et cetera

The said day the prouest and balyeis assignit friday that next cumys
tile Isabele of crichtoun' to preiwe the govne of Rossat lynt with banys
quhilkis Williame Wormet has now in his possessioun' was Johne Wormetis
best govne and pertenis to James Wormet his Sone as ayrschipe and was
in his possessioun' in tyme of his deces'

The said day Dauid Steuart lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht comperit tile
ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of ij
franche Crovnis xliiij eduarde grotis and demi Inglis grotis comperit nocht tharfor
the balyes assignit to him this day xv dais tile ansuer to the said' borghe
as law wile

The said' day Williame Wormet Solemptlie protestit that he mycht haue the
avale of the Jak left to him be vmquhile Johne Wormet sene It was decernit
fra him and deliuerit

The said' day the borghe' fundin one Androw litstar for the Spilling of tuelf
eln' of clatht be Johne Wilyoungsone' was fundin of nayne availe in the
litting for the quhilkis the saide Johne was in ane amerciament of the court Ande
the saide Androw was quyt of his challance be ane Suorne assis'
patry leslie forspekar
